div.p:
( A) Total number of weeks (wk) with sea surface temperatures (SST) greater than or equal to 7 threshold values between 14 °C and 26 °C (2 °C increments), and ( B) the thermal integral of SST ≥22 °C (degree-wk) for each year from 1959 to 2017. The dotted line indicates a significant linear increase in the thermal integral over time (R 2 = 0.45; p < 0.001). Data are from ref.
33 and https://web.uri.edu/plankton/. Gaps in A indicate missing data.
